reviews.text: I mixed this recipe not long after Fizz first posted it at reddit - this was the first recipe that made me realise DIY juice was viable.  I now find it a little heavy on flavouring for modern type devices but still a classic for atomisers that aren't cloud chuckers.
one of my all time favorites
An old staple I keep coming back to. Thanks for reposting it here.
Finally mixed this up. I simply LOVE it. Amazing juice.
